about: I'm Roman Wu, a software engineer with expertise in distributed systems, backend development, and cloud infrastructure. With a Bachelor’s in Mathematics from the University of Waterloo, I’ve contributed to fintech, transportation, and tech industries, building scalable, data-driven solutions.

Currently at McKeil Marine Ltd, I design real-time pricing models and financial automation systems using AWS and Databricks, achieving a 5% profitability boost and 25% lower operational costs. Previous roles at Hardbacon and ByteDance involved optimizing microservices and high-volume caching for millions of users.
Certified in AWS and Kubernetes, I specialize in Python, Java, and SQL, and focus on creating high-quality, resilient applications.
